## Last Verse
<!--Put a short poem you created using chatGPT of 20 to 30 lines,here!-->

In the dawn's embrace, the sun awakes,  
Painting skies with golden flakes.   
Meadows whisper, kissed by dew,   
Nature's symphony, fresh and new.  

Through the forest, whispers breeze,  
Dancing leaves, a tranquil tease.  
Rivers hum their ancient song,  
Guiding life, serene and strong.  

Mountains stand with silent pride,  
Legends etched on every side.  
Stars ignite the velvet night,  
Guiding dreams with gentle light.  

In city streets where chaos reigns,  
Hope persists through life's refrains.  
Hands entwine, hearts beat as one,  
Love's embrace beneath the sun.  

Echoes of laughter fill the air,  
Moments cherished, beyond compare.  
With every step, a journey unfolds,  
In stories written, in tales untold.  

Life's tapestry, a wondrous sight,  
A blend of darkness, a splash of light.  
In every soul, a universe resides,  
Boundless dreams, where destiny guides.
